parse.title: Hey! Now! Come Hoy Now! Whither Do You Wander?

links.*: Poems in The Lord of the Rings

wikitext.*:
'''Hey! Now! Come Hoy Now! Whither Do You Wander?''' is one of the songs sung by [[Tom Bombadil]].<ref>{{FR|I8}}</ref>

==The poem==
<poem>
''Hey! now! Come hoy now! Whither do you wander?''
''Up, down, near or far, here, there or yonder?''
''[[Sharp-ears]], [[Wise-nose]], [[Swish-tail]] and [[Bumpkin]],''
''[[White-socks]] my little lad, and old [[Fatty Lumpkin]]!''
</poem>
